title: When I say "Hey Google" I don't hear the notification on my Pixel 4.
content:
I don't hear the notification sound when I say "Hey Google" on my Pixel 4XL.  It works on my Google Home speaker or if I use a Bluetooth headphone and press the action button. I just can't hear the sound when I say it by voice only. 

All help documents I've found is for the Google Home and that doesn't help for the phone.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
